Phase6Description: Cannibals from the northern Dry Steppes have bled into the area surrounding Zakarum Chapel. They are butchering refugees and pilgrims. I’ve been tasked by a priestess to clear the roads.
Toast: The roads outside the Zakarum Chapel are overrun with cannibals.
Phase9Description: I’ve dealt with the cannibal threat. I should return to the Zakarum Chapel and inform the priestess.
Callback5Header: Slay cannibals outside of Zakarum Chapel: {DONE_OVER_NEEDED}
Name: Butchers of the North
